title: How to Make a Cherry Coke Salad

steps.headline: Drain the pineapple and set aside.
Pour the pineapple juice into a saucepan.
Add the water and bring to a boil.
Remove saucepan from the stove and stir in the gelatin powder.
Stir until the gelatin mixture is dissolved.
Add the cherry pie filling and cola.
Pour mixture into a serving bowl.
Let chill until mixture starts to thicken.
Fold in the reserved crushed pineapple.
Serve topped with Cool Whip, if desired.

text: Drain the pineapple and set aside.  Pour the pineapple juice into a saucepan.  Add the water and bring to a boil.  Remove saucepan from the stove and stir in the gelatin powder.  Stir until the gelatin mixture is dissolved.  Add the cherry pie filling and cola.  Pour mixture into a serving bowl.  Let chill until mixture starts to thicken.  Fold in the reserved crushed pineapple.  Refrigerate until firm.  Serve topped with Cool Whip, if desired.  Finished.
